title: pulsefire ezreal icon
body: When is the last day that the icon is going to be given out because i havent received mine yet :( thanks in advance

replies.body: Make sure to look for it now. I hear the poros made another pass with those icons ^_^
yet i still do not have it T.T
Man, those poros must have wandered off again. I gave them a little nudge in the right direction so go ahead and check for yours!
